For this assignment, you are required to create a template for a photo and video album page using the FLEX and/or GRID design patterns in HTML and CSS programming language. The album page should have a modern and visually appealing design, with clear and concise sections for photos and videos. Here are the steps you can follow to complete this assignment: 1. Plan the layout of the album page. Decide how many photos and videos you want to include and how you want to display them.
